overview: We are looking for a creative and results-driven Marketing professional to join our team and help drive brand awareness and customer engagement.
required_skills: Marketing Strategy, Digital Marketing, Content Creation, SEO, SEM, Social Media Management, Email Campaigns, Market Research, Analytics, Branding, Google Analytics, Adobe Creative Suite
experience: 2 years of experience in marketing or related fields.
good_to_have: Experience with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Influencer Marketing, and familiarity with marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo).
